alert.note: Alert for White (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 07 at 12:23AM EDT until May 07 at 1:30AM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: The National Weather Service in Northern Indiana has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... White County in northwestern Indiana... * Until 130 AM EDT. * At 1223 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Wolcott, or 8 miles southeast of Remington, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Monticello, Monon, Wolcott, Reynolds, Chalmers, Burnettsville, Smithson, Headlee, Golden Hill, Indiana Beach, Norway, Idaville, Sitka, Cedar Point, Bell Center and Buffalo. This includes Interstate 65 between mile markers 190 and 198. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
